arts.ttl: Rangers staff member PUSHED by angry Man Utd star as TV viewers left stunned by flashpoint
arts.sum: The assistant kitman, David MacGregor, found himself in all sorts of bother in added time

arts.ttl: World media reacts as Rangers sinner Butland slapped with the most hurtful insult over his Man Utd status
arts.sum: For four brief minutes it looked like Storm Cyriel was going to blow Rangers a huge step closer towards the Europa League’s last 16

arts.ttl: Three key questions for Rangers after Man Utd loss
arts.sum: Who plays in goals? Should Clement put faith in youth? And what about Cyriel Dessers' future? BBC Sport Scotland assesses three key issues for Rangers after late defeat by Man United.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim: Manchester United ‘needed’ win over Rangers
arts.sum: The win moves United up to fourth in the Europa League standings.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement warns Rangers Europa League job isn't done as yet more injuries get 'what can I do?' response
arts.sum: A late Man Utd winner after Cyriel Dessers stunning Old Trafford equaliser leaves Gers with work to do at Ibrox next week

arts.ttl: 'Sucker punch at death robs Rangers of brilliant point'
arts.sum: All the reaction after Rangers' late defeat to Manchester United in the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim offers update on new double injury blow in Rangers win
arts.sum: Red Devils could face defensive shortage for Fulham clash after bruising Europa League contest

arts.ttl: 'Hurt and hope for Clement as Rangers fight adversity'
arts.sum: Rangers fought hard against adversity and showed character against Manchester United to give themselves something to build on, says Tom English.

arts.ttl: Man United injury news: Red Devils suffer double blow against Rangers with key duo now major doubts for Fulham clash
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says that Matthijs de Ligt and Leny Yoro will both need to be assessed after suffering problems against Rangers on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand seethes as Rangers 'get away with one' vs Man Utd but young Bears leave him impressed – VIP pundits react
arts.sum: Alan Hutton had no argument after the decision to disallow Mathhijs De Ligt's first half header was slammed by Ferdinand
